pageContext.claim: “Why doesn’t the Fake News Media state that the Trump Administration’s Anti-Trust Division has been, and is, opposed to the AT&T purchase of Time Warner in a currently ongoing Trial. Such a disgrace in reporting!”
pageContext.analysis: Major media outlets routinely report that the Justice Department's antitrust division opposes this merger, and in fact, much of their coverage focuses on developments in the trial Trump that complains is being ignored.
